## uploadBytesResumable() function

Uploads data to this object's location. The upload can be paused and resumed, and exposes progress updates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function uploadBytesResumable(ref: types.StorageReference, data: Blob | Uint8Array | ArrayBuffer, metadata?: types.Metadata): types.UploadTask;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | types.StorageReference | StorageReference where data should be uploaded. |
|  data | Blob \| Uint8Array \| ArrayBuffer | The data to upload. |
|  metadata | types.Metadata | Metadata for the newly uploaded data. |

<b>Returns:</b>

types.UploadTask

An UploadTask
